title: How to Remove Chewing Gum from Hair
summary: Using peanut butter to remove chewing gum from hair.
content: To remove chewing gum from hair using peanut butter, apply a generous amount of peanut butter to the gum and the surrounding hair. Massage the peanut butter into the gum to break it down and make it less sticky. After a few minutes, gently comb out the gum with a fine-toothed comb. Wash the hair thoroughly with shampoo to remove any peanut butter residue.
